subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
United States Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: College sports have given Kenneth W. Starr, now president of Baylor, a second act in public life, as a major player in the debate over the compensation of athletes.
snippet: College sports have given Kenneth W. Starr, now president of Baylor, a second act in public life, as a major player in the debate over the compensation of athletes.
